SEARCH
Package SensorData

Class SensorData

java.lang.Object
SensorData.SensorData
public class SensorData extends Object
This class represents the sensor data for a celestial body, including temperature, pressure, humidity, and radiation.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SensorData()
    Default constructor for the SensorData class.
    SensorData(double temp, double pressure, double humidity, double radiation)
    Constructor to initialize the sensor data with specific values.

  • Constructor Details

    • SensorData

      public SensorData(double temp, double pressure, double humidity, double radiation)
      Constructor to initialize the sensor data with specific values.
      Parameters:
      temp - The temperature of the celestial body.
      pressure - The pressure of the celestial body.
      humidity - The humidity of the celestial body (must be between 0 and 100).
      radiation - The radiation level of the celestial body.

    • SensorData

      public SensorData()
      Default constructor for the SensorData class.

      Parameters:
      t - The temperature value.

      Retrieves the temperature of the celestial body.

      Parameters:

      Retrieves the pressure of the celestial body.
      Returns:
      The pressure of the celestial body.

    • setHumidiy

      public void setHumidiy(double humidity)
      Sets the humidity for the celestial body. Humidity must be between 0 and 100.
      Parameters:
      humidity - The humidity value.

    • getHumidity

      Retrieves the humidity of the celestial body.
      Returns:
      The humidity of the celestial body.

      Parameters:
      r - The radiation value.

    • getRadiation

      public double getRadiation()
      Retrieves the radiation level of the celestial body.
      Returns:
